text: The Algeria national under-20 football team represents Algeria in international football completions. They were quarter-finalists at the 1979 FIFA World Youth Championship in Japan in their only appearance. ==Tournament Records== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup record=== FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup
